components.description:
A construction helmet, which is worn by the construction worker emoji in some emoji sets.

The cross on the helmet (shown in the Apple version of this emoji) is used in Japan as a safety reminder in construction zones. It is also commonly seen on the Met helmet in the game Mega Man.
components.title: Helmet with White Cross

description:
A construction helmet, which is worn by the construction worker emoji in some emoji sets.

The cross on the helmet (shown in the Apple version of this emoji) is used in Japan as a safety reminder in construction zones. It is also commonly seen on the Met helmet in the game Mega Man.
title: Helmet with White Cross

version.description:
Unicode 5.2 pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by one year, and included many characters primarily sourced from the ARIB set of Japanese broadcasting symbols.

The following characters were among those added to Unicode in 2009, several of which were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols -> Traffic sign from ARIB STD B24

bn:00089233v: Put on or wear a hat

bn:00084198v: Make by combining materials and parts
To create something by combining or assembling materials or parts or by changing it.
To form by combining materials or parts.
(transitive) to form by combining materials or parts.
To build or form (something) by assembling parts.
To form or formulate in the mind.

bn:00082481v: Give help or assistance; be of service
To give assistance or aid to.

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

bn:00013723n: Or the erection of a building
Building construction is the process of preparing for and forming buildings and building systems.
Process that consists of the building or assembling of infrastructure

The construction, rehabilitation, alteration, conversion, extension, demolition or repair of buildings, highways, or other changes or improvement to real property, including facilities providing utility services.
The act or process of building.

bn:00043623n: A protective helmet, as worn, for example, by a motorcyclist, bicyclist, or soldier in combat.
A helmet is a form of protective gear worn to protect the head from injuries.
Any of various forms of protective head covering worn e.g.  by soldiers, firefighters, divers, cyclists, etc.
Armor plate that protects the head

bn:00017718n: A covering for the head, often in the approximate form of a cone or a cylinder closed at its top end, and sometimes having a brim and other decoration.
An item of clothing worn on a person's head.
Headdress that protects the head from bad weather; has shaped crown and usually a brim
A hat is a head covering.
"Chapeau" is a French term signifying a hat or other covering for the head.
An item of clothing intended to cover the head made from material hard enough to have a shape independant of the skull, and most commonly with a rim.
